text: Klubi Futbollistik Trepça '89, commonly known as Trepça '89, is a professional football club based in Mitrovica, Kosovo. The club plays in the Football Superleague of Kosovo, which is the top tier of football in the country. ==History== ===Minatori 89=== In 1992, The club was founded as Minatori '89. Number 89, symbolizes the year of the 1989 Kosovo miners' strike. In the 2016–17 season they were crowned champions for the first time in the club's history. ==Honours== {| class="wikitable" width=72% style="text- align:center;font-size:100%;" |+KF Trepça'89 honours !scope=col|Type !scope=col|Competition !scope=col|Titles !scope=col|Seasons/Years |- |rowspan="4"|Domestic !scope=col|Football Superleague of Kosovo |rowspan="4"|1 |2016–17 |- !scope=col|First Football League of Kosovo |2009–10 |- !scope=col|Kosovar Cup |2011–12 |- !scope=col|Kosovar Supercup |2016–17 |} ==Players== ===Current squad=== ==Personnel== {| class="wikitable" width=40% style="text-align:left;font-size:100%;" |- !colspan="4"|Current technical staff |- !Position !Name |- |Head coach | |- |Assistant coach | |- |Physiotherapist | |- !colspan="2"|Board members |- !Office !Name |- |President | |- |Sports director | |} ===Historical list of coaches=== * Gani Sejdiu (Aug 2012 \- Sep 2013) * Arsim Abazi (22 Sep 2013 \- Oct 2013)Abazi debuton me fitore në stolin e Trepça ‘89 - Bota Sot * Fahredin Durak ( \- 22 Mar 2015) * Afrim Tovërlani (23 Mar 2015 \- Jun 2015)Zyrtare: Afrim Toverlani trajner i ri i Trepçës ‘89 - Gazeta Express * Arsim Thaqi (24 Jun 2015 \- Dec 2015)Arsim Thaqi, trajner i Trepça’89 - Telegrafi * Gani Sejdiu (13 Jan 2016 \- May 2016)Gani Sejdiu, trajner i Trepçës ‘89 - Telegrafi * Bekim Shotani (17 Jun 2016 \- 15 Sep 2016)ZYRTARE: Bekim Shotani, trajner i Trepçës ‘89 - Gazeta Olle * Veton Çitaku (16 Sep 2016 \- 11 Jan 2017) * Zekirija Ramadani (17 Jan 2017 \- 13 Sep 2017)Trepça ’89 prezanton trajnerin e ri - Telegrafi * Sabit Osmani (14 Sep 2017 \- 18 Oct 2017) (caretaker) * Gani Sejdiu (18 Oct 2017 \- 3 Dec 2017)Lajmi mbrëmjes vjen nga Mitrovica, Gani Sejdiu trajner i Trepça ‘89 - Gazeta Topi * Gugash Magani (29 Dec 2017 \- 1 Nov 2018)Zyrtare: Gugash Magani, trajner i ri i Trepça ’89 - Telegrafi * Shpëtim Idrizi (4 Aug 2019 \- )LAJMI I FUNDIT: Shpëtim Idrizi bëhet trajner i skuadrës së Superligës - Gazeta Olle ==Trepça'89 in Europe== Trepça'89 will compete in the UEFA Champions League for the first time in the 2017–18 season, entering at the first qualifying round. On 19 June 2017, in Nyon, the draw was held and Trepça'89 were drawn against Faroese side Víkingur Gøta. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Season !Competition !Round !Opponent !Home !Away ! |- |2017–18 |UEFA Champions League |1Q |align="left"| Víkingur Gøta |bgcolor="#FFDDDD"|1–4 |bgcolor="#FFDDDD"|1–2 |bgcolor="#FFDDDD"|2–6 |} ===UEFA club coefficient ranking=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" !Rank !Team !Points !Country Part |- |445 |align=left| Tre Penne |0.750 |0.133 |- |446 |align=left| Santa Coloma |0.750 |0.366 |-bgcolor="#DDFFDD" |447 |align=left| Trepça'89 |0.500 |0.500 |- |448 |align=left| Lusitanos |0.500 |0.366 |- |449 |align=left| Juvenes/Dogana |0.250 |0.133 |- |450 |align=left| Libertas |0.250 |0.133 |} ==References== ==External links== *KF Trepça'89 at UEFA *KF Trepça'89 at Soccerway Category:Association football clubs established in 1992 Category:Football clubs in Yugoslavia Category:Football clubs in Kosovo Category:Sport in Mitrovica, Kosovo Category:Mining association football teams
